Version 5.1.2 Update.
1. Comprehensive upgrade of the Balances page.
2. Support for deposits & withdrawals of coins with multiple chains.
3. The system performance is optimized.
4. Chart settings can be saved now.

1. Charts support screenshot sharing.
2. Users can share the app now.
3. Bugs are fixed.

2. Accuracy of price conversion is improved.
3. Google Authenticator reset guide is newly added.
